question: How to maintain solar panels?
answer: Clean panels every 2-3 months using soft water and a cloth. Avoid harsh chemicals. Check wiring annually. In dusty areas, increase cleaning frequency.

question: Do solar panels work on cloudy or rainy days?
answer: Yes, panels still generate 10-25% of their capacity during cloudy/rainy days. For backup, hybrid systems with batteries are recommended.

question: What is the lifespan of a solar system?
answer: Most panels last 25-30 years with 80% efficiency remaining. Inverters usually last 10-12 years. Proper maintenance extends system life.

question: Can I run an AC on a solar system?
answer: Yes, you can. A 1.5 ton AC typically needs a 3-5kW solar system depending on usage hours. Hybrid systems with batteries ensure uninterrupted AC use.

question: What warranties are available for solar systems?
answer: Panels come with 10-12 years product warranty and 25 years performance warranty. Inverters usually have 5-10 years warranty depending on brand.
